title: Film Festival: The Marriage
description:
Duration: 97 min
Kosovo/Albania, 2017, 97mins.
DIRECTOR: Blerta Zeqiri
WITH: Alban Ukaj, Adriana Matoshi, Genc Salihu, Edon Rizvanolli

 

 

The wedding is only two weeks away. Anita and Bekim are adding the final touches to their big day. Despite expecting news from Anita’s parents, declared missing since the 1999 Kosovar War, and having to deal with Bekim’s controlling family, the couple seem to manage somehow with the preparations. But when Nol, Bekim’s secret former gay lover, returns unexpectedly from abroad, the situation becomes complicated.

The Cambridge Film Festival is presented by the Cambridge Film Trust, a registered charity with a mission to foster film culture and education for the benefit of the public, in Cambridge and the Eastern region but also throughout the UK.
